name: Easy Chicken Rice Casserole
author: VET2B01
summary: Chicken pieces and rice baked slowly in milk and cream of chicken soup. A simple, creamy casserole. You can also use a whole (2 to 3 pound) chicken, cut into pieces. The choice is yours so choose and choose well! Then enjoy!
ingredients: 6  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl combine the milk, rice, soup and seasoned salt if desired
Pour mixture into a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
Cover dish tightly with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for approximately 90 minutes or until rice is done, stirring every 30 minutes
Uncover the dish and bake for another 15 minutes to allow the rice to brown
